Class Request

java.lang.Object
fr.polytech.picknpic.bl.models.Request
public class Request extends Object
Represents a request in the Pick'n'Pic application. This class models the data for a request created by a user for a specific service.

      public int getIdRequest()
      Gets the unique identifier for the request.
      Returns:
      the unique request ID.

      Parameters:
      id_request - the unique request ID.

    • getIdUserBuyer

      public int getIdUserBuyer()
      Gets the identifier for the buyer who created the request.
      Returns:
      the buyer's user ID.

    • setIdUserBuyer

      Sets the identifier for the buyer who created the request.
      Parameters:
      id_user_buyer - the buyer's user ID.

      Sets the image associated with the request.

    • getStatus

      public String getStatus()
      Gets the current status of the request.
      Returns:
      the status of the request.

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(String status)
      Sets the current status of the request. Valid values are "waiting", "accepted waiting", "delivered", or "declined".
      Parameters:
      status - the status of the request.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the status is invalid.

    • isDelivered

      public boolean isDelivered()
      Checks if the request has been delivered.
      Returns:
      true if the request is delivered, false otherwise.

    • isWaiting

      public boolean isWaiting()
      Checks if the request is waiting for approval.
      Returns:
      true if the request status is "waiting", false otherwise.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Converts the request to a string representation for debugging.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string representation of the request object.
